name: Aeroblast
efect: High critical hit ratio.

name: Ancient Power
efect: May raise all user's stats at once.

name: Attract
efect: If opponent is the opposite gender, it's less likely to attack.

name: Baton Pass
efect: User switches out and gives stat changes to the incoming Pokémon.

name: Beat Up
efect: Each Pokémon in user's party attacks.

name: Belly Drum
efect: User loses 50% of its max HP, but Attack raises to maximum.

name: Bone Rush
efect: Hits 2-5 times in one turn.

name: Charm
efect: Sharply lowers opponent's Attack.

name: Conversion 2
efect: User changes type to become resistant to opponent's last move.

name: Cotton Spore
efect: Sharply lowers opponent's Speed.

name: Cross Chop
efect: High critical hit ratio.

name: Crunch
efect: May lower opponent's Defense.

name: Curse
efect: Ghosts lose 50% of max HP and curse the opponent; Non-Ghosts raise Attack, Defense and lower Speed.

name: Destiny Bond
efect: If the user faints, the opponent also faints.

name: Detect
efect: Protects the user, but may fail if used consecutively.

name: Dragon Breath
efect: May paralyze opponent.

name: Dynamic Punch
efect: Confuses opponent.

name: Encore
efect: Forces opponent to keep using its last move for 3 turns.

name: Endure
efect: Always left with at least 1 HP, but may fail if used consecutively.

name: Extreme Speed
efect: User attacks first.

name: False Swipe
efect: Always leaves opponent with at least 1 HP.

name: Feint Attack
efect: Ignores Accuracy and Evasiveness.

name: Flail
efect: The lower the user's HP, the higher the power.

name: Flame Wheel
efect: May burn opponent.

name: Foresight
efect: Resets opponent's Evasiveness, and allows Normal- and Fighting-type attacks to hit Ghosts.

name: Frustration
efect: Power decreases with higher Friendship.

name: Fury Cutter
efect: Power increases each turn.

name: Future Sight
efect: Damage occurs 2 turns later.

name: Giga Drain
efect: User recovers half the HP inflicted on opponent.

name: Heal Bell
efect: Heals the user's party's status conditions.

name: Hidden Power
efect: Type and power depends on user's IVs.

name: Icy Wind
efect: Lowers opponent's Speed.

name: Iron Tail
efect: May lower opponent's Defense.

name: Lock-On
efect: User's next attack is guaranteed to hit.

name: Mach Punch
efect: User attacks first.

name: Magnitude
efect: Hits with random power.

name: Mean Look
efect: Opponent cannot flee or switch.

name: Metal Claw
efect: May raise user's Attack.

name: Milk Drink
efect: User recovers half its max HP.

name: Mind Reader
efect: User's next attack is guaranteed to hit.

name: Mirror Coat
efect: When hit by a Special Attack, user strikes back with 2x power.

name: Moonlight
efect: User recovers HP. Amount varies with the weather.

name: Morning Sun
efect: User recovers HP. Amount varies with the weather.

name: Mud-Slap
efect: Lowers opponent's Accuracy.

name: Nightmare
efect: The sleeping opponent loses 25% of its max HP each turn.

name: Octazooka
efect: May lower opponent's Accuracy.

name: Outrage
efect: User attacks for 2-3 turns but then becomes confused.

name: Pain Split
efect: The user's and opponent's HP becomes the average of both.

name: Perish Song
efect: Any Pokémon in play when this attack is used faints in 3 turns.

name: Powder Snow
efect: May freeze opponent.

name: Present
efect: Either deals damage or heals.

name: Protect
efect: Protects the user, but may fail if used consecutively.

name: Psych Up
efect: Copies the opponent's stat changes.

name: Pursuit
efect: Double power if the opponent is switching out.

name: Rain Dance
efect: Makes it rain for 5 turns.

name: Rapid Spin
efect: Raises user's Speed and removes entry hazards and trap move effects.

name: Return
efect: Power increases with higher Friendship.

name: Reversal
efect: The lower the user's HP, the higher the power.

name: Rock Smash
efect: May lower opponent's Defense.

name: Rollout
efect: Doubles in power each turn for 5 turns.

name: Sacred Fire
efect: May burn opponent.

name: Safeguard
efect: The user's party is protected from status conditions.

name: Sandstorm
efect: Creates a sandstorm for 5 turns.

name: Scary Face
efect: Sharply lowers opponent's Speed.

name: Shadow Ball
efect: May lower opponent's Special Defense.

name: Sketch
efect: Permanently copies the opponent's last move.

name: Sleep Talk
efect: User performs one of its own moves while sleeping.

name: Sludge Bomb
efect: May poison opponent.

name: Snore
efect: Can only be used if asleep. May cause flinching.

name: Spark
efect: May paralyze opponent.

name: Spider Web
efect: Opponent cannot escape/switch.

name: Spikes
efect: Hurts opponents when they switch into battle.

name: Spite
efect: The opponent's last move loses 2-5 PP.

name: Steel Wing
efect: May raise user's Defense.

name: Sunny Day
efect: Makes it sunny for 5 turns.

name: Swagger
efect: Confuses opponent, but sharply raises its Attack.

name: Sweet Kiss
efect: Confuses opponent.

name: Sweet Scent
efect: Lowers opponent's Evasiveness.

name: Synthesis
efect: User recovers HP. Amount varies with the weather.

name: Thief
efect: Also steals opponent's held item.

name: Triple Kick
efect: Hits thrice in one turn at increasing power.

name: Twister
efect: May cause flinching. Hits Pokémon using Fly/Bounce with double power.

name: Vital Throw
efect: User attacks last, but ignores Accuracy and Evasiveness.

name: Whirlpool
efect: Traps opponent, damaging them for 4-5 turns.

name: Zap Cannon
efect: Paralyzes opponent.
